heading: HR00016
0: RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE TO VIGOROUSLY PURSUE THE ALREADY JUMPSTARTED PEACE NEGOTIATIONS BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF THE PHILIPPINES (GPH) AND THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF THE PHILIPPINES (NDFP) AND CAUSE THE IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF DETAINED NDFP PEACE TALKS CONSULTANTS IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE JOINT AGREEMENT ON SAFETY AND IMMUNITY GUARANTEES PREVIOUSLY SIGNED BY THE GPH AND THE NDFP
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FREDENIL "FRED" H.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00016
